Player History
Injured on 5/23/1965 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 6/12/1968, off Joey Jay (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/11/1968, off Manny Montejo (HOU)...
Injured on 6/22/1971 with a Bruised Jaw, out for one week...
Traded from Chicago (N) to San Francisco on 1/31/1972 (Going to CHC: P R. Jones. Going to SF: C J. Sevcik)...
Released by San Francisco on 4/1/1972...
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by Boston in 1975...
Injured on 7/27/1978 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5-6 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/4/1979...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1979, going 5-0, 1.25...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1979, going 17-9, 3.81 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1980, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1982, going 5-0, 1.84...
Injured on 9/28/1982 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1983, going 5-0, 1.41...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/9/1983 with a Tight Elbow, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1985, going 4-1, 1.38...
